page.title: 17Hiams Farms, Prickwillow
page.content: On the Five farms we have{32 Staff which includes 3 Women, 4 Building maintainers, 2 fitters, 2 labourers, 22 Tractor Drivers, 1 Junior Manager and 1 Manager(Mr Green). We don't have any Casual Labour at all due to Mechanisation. On the 5 Farms we grow 600 plus acres of Sugar Beet, 400 acres Potatoes, 300 acres Onions, 250 acres carrots, 200 acres Peas, the rest (1200 acres) is Cereals. We need to{rotate our Crops}to avoid crop pests like Eel Worm for Potatoes. The Peat won't support 2 years of Wheat.
